## Overview
This project studies shear-driven granular flow using **DEM simulations** in **MercuryDPM**.

## What I did
- Designed simulation cases for controlled shear
- Ran parameter sweeps (material parameters, shear rate, packing fraction)
- Post-processed results using Python
- Generated plots, animations, and videos

## Key outputs
- Velocity profiles  
- Stress response and friction coefficient  
- Solid fraction evolution
